title: The real reasons why assassins completely suck this season
body:
It's not really an issue of itemization (though that certainly doesn't help), the biggest problem is that the champions that assassins counter (adcs) are becoming much more powerful much earlier. This causes organized teamfighting to happen much earlier in the game.

The problem with early team fighting is that the earlier you teamfight the less time you have to make picks in side lanes, during rotations or what have you. That tied with the fact that assassins are no longer stronger when on even ground with the top tier ADCs, meaning even someone like Rengar or Zed can easily lose to a mid game ADC due to their much earlier damage spikes.

The real concern is that assassins are supposed to counter the ADC meta, but with how fast it is that just isn't possible.
